channel.title: DemolishScape V4 ---Source + Client---
channel.description:
Heyy, hope you like V4 ;)
Base:Rubik's Scape
Client Download: http://uppit.com/v/QRYQPG9L
Source Download: http://uppit.com/v/c4elwj60
DemolishScape Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rl2wbNDy6-M
New Features *New Train *New Shops *New Pk *New Staffzone *Party area Otherss...
Pictures
Working Dragon Defender [IMG]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_14052009_075651.jpg[/img] New Shops [IMG]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_12052009_110848.jpg[/img] Party Area [IMG]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_12052009_110914.jpg[/img] New Staffzone ::staff [IMG]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_12052009_110948.jpg[/img] New Pk [IMG]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_12052009_111042.jpg[/img] New Train [IMG]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_12052009_111019.jpg[/img]
DemolishScape V4 Still Includes The Rest of the stuff from V1-V3
Credits - to rubik's scape for the skills area and barrows the rest coded by me :)
~thanks
-Mod Demolish

item.title: DemolishScape V4 ---Source + Client---
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

as for this being my first source and client i really liked this, i made it a webclient and can list a ton of things wrong with it, and then after still using the client after so much hard work into it i found the same source/client but with no bugs and glitches by just simply downloading the allstar base server+client… I have lost a lot of respect for demolish, theres things that he made WORSE FOR THE SERVER. 1). He made npc’s not attack back
2). Very simple to dupe 3). SO MANY WAYS TO DUPE 4). All he did was move train, home, and train… if thats considered releasing a source+client custom made then i think i should go download this source rename it fuckscape and release it to everybody. This was a good server and client until i found allstar base (which this is not rubik scape) and i’m sure i’ve mastered this client+source to the extent that demolish can’t. I hope he’s not offended and none of you are too, but this is just rubbish compared to all-star based, his V5+ are allright though and i recommend everyone check’s them out because they’re coded a lot better then this one, I’m still a demolish fan but this v4 is not very well coded. x) i love u demolish if ur reading this hahaha

Read full topic

item.title: DemolishScape V4 ---Source + Client---
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“mrcrispypwn, post:40, topic:278243”][quote author=Nasz link=topic=367231.msg3567255#msg3567255 date=1302745032]

5/10 won’t dl sorry its alright, but i just want to say something. making these type of servers which no one plays anymore just ruins rsps now. Move on and start making servers rs-alike, not with edited emote tabs and edited sprites, its horrible.

Um, you come out with a 641, actually it’s higher deob now since RuneScape just added in the Clan Capes. If you’re a “RS-ALIKE FAN”, Create a 641+ server.

5/10 won’t dl sorry its alright, but i just want to say something. making these type of servers which no one plays anymore just ruins rsps now. Move on and start making servers rs-alike, not with edited emote tabs and edited sprites, its horrible.

Agreed with the sprites part. Though some people came to this community for just these reasons. A different game entirely. I’m a rs-alike fan making a 614 (WOOT) though if this is what he wants then watever

You are no different, you’re basically using dkk’s source. And RuneScape alike, that would be 641+ now. And that was made by dkk, surprised you dunno bout it… but it might load higher due too clan capes. Some people like old school runescape, (317-508), and other people like Rs2… don’t troll a thread over sprites though, cuz you don’t even understand methods.
[/quote]
You gave me an incorrect method?[/quote]

You came to us for help? And at that, I’m the only one who got the closest, and did you not read my post? That was off of my head from a 562.

Read full topic

item.title: DemolishScape V4 ---Source + Client---
item.dc:creator: @Garswood Garswood
item.description:
@Garswood wrote:

[quote=“WaleedScape, post:26, topic:278243”][quote author=mathewhampson link=topic=367231.msg3228675#msg3228675 date=1275837128]
10/10 nice custom items and servers do not have to be like rs to be other people like servers like this like i do customs are amazing nice job dude keep up the good work and its hard to script a server atleast he made 1 so shh guys
[/quote]
Why dont u:

  1. Speak fucking english

  2. Use punctuation

  3. you dont SCRIPT a server, you CODE one[/quote]

  4. You said ‘u’ throughout that post which isn’t English, therefore you yourself aren’t speaking English.

  5. You said ‘use punctuation’ and you then said ‘dont’ when it should be ‘don’t’. You aren’t using punctuation.

  6. Shut up and sort yourself out first.

item.title: DemolishScape V4 ---Source + Client---
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Over all this is a good source + client.

I ran this source a few years back, removed the shitty recolors and stuff. But other then that, lots of people enjoyed it.

Also probally cuz I added fully animated godwars, skill capes emote, and real highscores

-Will
